nodes.text: Sandi was a female Human and con artist on the planet Lianna. She was trying to make a name for herself through the club owner Orman whom she worked for as a thug, however few of his other employees took her seriously. She spent the majority of here life living on the streets of Lola Curich and liked it this way. At some point during her employment she was ordered to attack a group of Alliance to Restore the Republic agents.
